scripts.name: echo ${npm_package_name}
scripts.postinstall: npx shx mkdir -p src/assets/monaco-editor/min && npx shx cp -R node_modules/monaco-editor/min/* src/assets/monaco-editor/min/
scripts.docker:build-compile: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && docker buildx build --target compile-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 -t infernokun/$PROJECT:compile .
scripts.docker:build-runtime: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && export VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker buildx build --target runtime-stage --build-arg BUILDKIT_INLINE_CACHE=1 -t infernokun/$PROJECT:$VERSION -t infernokun/${npm_package_name}:latest .
scripts.docker:push: export PROJECT=$(jq -r .name package.json) && export VERSION=$(jq -r .version package.json) && docker push infernokun/$PROJECT:$VERSION && docker push infernokun/$PROJECT:latest
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build-compile -s && npm run docker:build-runtime -s && npm run docker:push -s
